option.value: {"dllFixUrl":"https://juejin.cn/post/7227825056977485884","documentChangeMergeTimeRange":70,"guideBaseUrl":"https://smart-input-source-1315501506.cos.ap-shanghai.myqcloud.com/guidedoc","guidePurchaseAfterExpired":"试用已结束，请点击激活插件按钮，一次性付费永久使用，如果您有不好的使用体验，可以通过微信公众号“效率铺子”让我们知道，我们将持续进行优化。您也可以稍后从这里进行激活操作”顶部导航栏->Tools->Smart Input->激活插件“","ignoreCaretBetweenDocumentChangeTimeInterval":100,"inputSourceChangeDelayEffectTime":600,"inputSourceChangeKeyEventTimeInterval":30,"inputSourceManagerKeyDelay":50000,"inputSourceStatusSwitchMaxKeyTimeInterval":320,"officialWebsiteUrl":"https://mp.weixin.qq.com/mp/appmsgalbum?action=getalbum&album_id=3366659816064237569","projectSearchChangeDelay":1000,"sameLanguageTwiceTimeInterval":1000,"serviceHostName":"https://xiaolvpuzi.cn"}
